text: i think activate buys startups the
breathing room or the time they need to
go from idea to inmarket product as part
of activate you get credits that go
towards paying your bill and you get
credits that go towards your support
this is very useful whether you are
running into small issues or major
issues because there will always be
someone that can help you quickly or can
work with your existing engineering team
to solve the issue i'm Alexander Mans
i'm the co-founder and CTO of Flyer Labs
flyier Labs uh is a data science company
that has developed a way to very
accurately predict what the price of
airline tickets or similar products like
hotel rooms or rental cars i noticed
that prices of airline tickets always
fluctuate and I wanted to find out why
that happens so that I could understand
how to leverage um that fluctuation to
my benefit and what we do is we build
technology for very very large travel
companies uh the kind of companies that
you use to search for flights where you
buy your hotels etc and we enable them
to build new kinds of experiences and
products on top of our predicted
technology during that first investment
round one of our investors pointed out
the activate program we signed up we got
approved and we didn't just save a lot
of capital if you will uh by using
Activate in that very early phase but we
already got a lot of support from AWS
technicians and architects to help us
develop our platform and our solution we
were able to go from a few thousand API
requests per month to tens of millions
of API requests per month and we did it
in a matter of few weeks while your
requirements as a startup or a
technology company change over time AWS
has the ability to scale with you on
that path that every technology company
usually follows um and that's really why
we started working with AWS since the
very beginning aws makes it very easy
for you to manage your costs be in
control of your budget and I think also
what's important is AWS always keeps
improving their solutions over time
either by adding new products or by
listening to customers like us that need
new features or requirements i think
that helps make not just AWS better but
it also makes the companies that are
using AWS better over time
[Music]
